meanings.def: a member of a commission (= an official group of people who are responsible for controlling something or finding out about something)
examples: the Church Commissioners (= the group of people responsible for controlling the financial affairs of the Church of England)

meanings.def: the head of a particular police force in some countries
the head of a government department in some countries
examples: Commissioner Rhodes was unavailable for comment.
The Economic Affairs Commissioner, Albert Johnson, resigned over the issue.
The merger has been referred to the European Competition Commissioner.

meanings.def: (in the US) an official chosen by a sports association to control it
examples: a commissioner for the Central Collegiate Hockey Association
